item.title: [CIT CTF 2025] Solving all Web challenges
item.description:
Hello, I joined the CTF for fun during the weekend.

I focused on web challenges and completed all challenges in this category. The challenges were straightforward and made for a fun weekend.

Mr. Chatbot

The application shows a welcome page asking for your name, then puts you in a chat with a bot. The goal was to get the Flag from the bot. This wasn’t an LLM attack â€” responses came from JavaScript files.
